amendatorysection.catchline: Departments; officers; bond or insurance required.
amendatorysection.para: Each head of a department shall be bonded or insured as required by section 11-201, which bond or policy shall be filed in the office of the Secretary of State.

crossreference.para: For bond, see section 11-102 and Chapter 11, article 2.

annotation.para: Head of department herein referred to represents exactly the same head of executive department referred to in the Constitution. State ex rel. Johnson v. Chase, 147 Neb. 758, 25 N.W.2d 1 (1946).
